::: callout-note
## The specific learning goals for today's session are:

-   [ ] Standups
-   [ ] Introduce profiles.yml
-   [ ] Cloud options:
    - Option 1: Work with UHC cloud storage
    - Option 2: Work with other (Azure, AWS, GCP) cloud storage
    - Option 3: Work with cloud database (GCP BigQuery, Azure Synapse, Azure SQL)
-   [ ] Collaborative workflow:
    - GitHub branches
    - Branch protection
    - Issues/discussion
    - deployment of DBT documentation
    - ETL pipeline
:::
